example.parse: خطا الطفل من حجرته إلى المطبخ

example.parse: (S (PUNC -) (VP (PSEUDO_VERB ان) (NP-SBJ-1 (NOUN_PROP افغانستان)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS خطت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC خطوة)) (PP (PREP على) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN درب) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN السلام))))))) (PUNC .))
